[2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334]:8
[2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334]:80
[2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334]:800
[2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334]:8000
[2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334]:65535
[2001:0db8:85a3:0000:0000:8a2e:0370:7334]:65536 does not exist

Note these are not fanged, this is standard ipv6 port notation
